Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player is a class that holds all information about a player's current status in the game
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benjamin Hartl, Nick Abrahan, Colin Biafore, Bryce Bowers
